Rosemead.Garfield Medical Center: Garfield Medical Center is a 210-bed general medical and surgical hospital located in Monterey Park, California. In the most recent year with available data, the hospital had 11,586 admissions, 21,621 emergency room visits, 1,949 annual inpatient surgeries and 2,602 outpatient surgeries. Garfield Medical Center is accredited by the Joint Commission (JC).
